ebandu witakadi niyamitha kalaya thuladi sapayu pilithuru pamanak agayimata lakkaranna.mebandu swayan agayim kramawedayak thula boho sisun muhunadena gatalu thaththwaya wanuye pilithuru agayimata yamedi prashna pathra wiwaranaye ho lakunu dime patipatiye adangu karunu therum ganime dushkarathawayi.

sanjanana danume wiwidha swarupa kamakdayi danaganima me thathwaya awama kirimata gathahaki ek priyogika wisandumaki.apage indriyaya sanjananayata awashyamawanuye kumana hadathalaye swarupayakdayi me mangin watahaganimata manda pitiwahalak in labe.me karuna sankalpitha ho gnyana wibhagayiya elambaumak sandaha bohowita adala we.esema eya ese elambaiya haki gnyanawibhagayiya wisandum sandaha mangapenwannakda we.me aakalpa nisa sanjanana wishaya pilibanda paryeshanathmaka adhyanayanayan bhauthika widya wa ha mano widyawa athara dolanaya swarupayakda widyanamana we.eya ekthara aakarayaka darshanayaki.wishaya anuwa nam kalahoth eya sanjanana darshanaya namin handinwiya hakiya.ee me sanjananaya darshanaya sandaha jiwa widyaathmaka pathikada thula krinayakarithwaya itha wadagathya.eya adhyandayanaya nokara sanjananaya pilibanda nisi awabodhayak labiya nohaka.

methanadi siduwim adu karala wedikawata uchitha kathawak nirmanaya wuna ekayi sidu wune.wishwasayak thiyenawa da wedikawata korale mahaththaya karala wedikawa jayagani kiyala.ow ee wishwasaya ma thulath mehi nishpadaka padmasiri kodikara mahaththaya thulath thiyenawa.

waidya ha injineru upadhiya hadarima pinisa nuwaraeliyata himiwana 70 k pamana wana wishwa widyala kotawa daha ganimata adhyapana baladharinge ha karsel himikaruwangeda daruwanda athuluwa mewara nuwaraeliyata pamini thibena pita palath sisu pirisa 305 k bawa palath adhyapana departhumenthuwa mewanawita handunagena thibe.puththalama disthrikkaye pasal 09 kada nuwaraeliya disthrikkaye pasal 19 kada anuradhapura disthrikkaye ek pasalakada mema mankollaya siduwa thibena bawa lanka widuhalpathi sangamaya pawasayi.mema siyalu pasal walin widya,ganitha, kalamanakarana ha kala wishayan wenuwen penisita athi bawata anumana karana shishyaya sankhyawa dahasa ikmawana bawa adhyapana rajyaya amathi wi.radhakrishnan mahatha pawasayi.

badu diriganwim - wikipidiya, nidahas wishwakoshaya badu diriganwim baddak yanu, mahajana aramunu sandaha rajaye awayawayak lesa panawanu labana aniwarya aya kara ganimak baddak lesa handunwayi. 1 baddaka thibiya yuthu lakshana 2 badu diriganwime swarupa 3 badu sama panatha ha in siduwu balapama 4 nuthana badu panatha ha badu diriganwim 6 me web adawith balanna baddaka thibiya yuthu lakshana[sanskaranaya] 1776 di prakashayata path kala adam smithge 'jathinge dhanaya' namathi kruthiye badu sambandhawa thibiya yuthu wadagath karunu 4 k dakwayi. 1.minisun upayana aadayamata ha dhanayata sarilana se owungen badu aya kala yuthuya. 2.abhimathanusari nowiya yuthuya. 3.badu aya karana kramaya sarala wiya yuthuya. 4.badu aya karagannata yodana kramawedaye piriwaya awama wiya yuthuya.
